product_name: Vittoria Rubino Pro III Tire - 700 x 23
long_description: The Vittoria Rubino Pro III racing tire pumps up the quality level with high-performance, high-mileage 150 TPI casing. Updated tread pattern increases the contact surface area and preserves low rolling resistance. The addition of Kevlar(R) Endura 3D compound improves wear, enhances grip and reduces rolling resistance. Mithril cut-resistant polymer weave in the sidewalls improves strength without affecting ride comfort and bump absorption. PBR(R) puncture protection is placed directly under the tread for maximum puncture protection while maintaining low rolling resistance.
short_description: The Vittoria Rubino Pro III racing tire pumps up the quality level with high-performance, high-mileage 150 TPI casing.
